name: Coding-standards
tagline: Documentation on coding standards used at Cubic Mushroom
body:
# Coding Standards

## Purpose

This is a working documentation site containing the coding standards used at Cubic Mushroom.  It's purpose is to ensure consistency of code across all projects by defining a set of rules for the format, and naming conventions used for all code.


## PSR Standards

All code must conform to [PSR-1: Basic Coding Standard](http://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-1/) and [PSR-2: Coding Style Guide](http://www.php-fig.org/psr/psr-2/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
